Test Name: Dilated Cardiomyopathy and Left Ventricular Noncompaction Cardiomyopathy Gene Panel
Purpose: To provide a standardized, accurate, and reliable analytical process for detecting pathogenic variants associated with dilated cardiomyopathy and left ventricular noncompaction cardiomyopathy.
Equipment: PCR thermocycler, DNA extraction kit, Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS) platform
